title: DDFP 582: Le'Veon Bell's future in Pittsburgh & Ike's Corner Corner
itunes:title: DDFP 582: Le'Veon Bell's future in Pittsburgh & Ike's Corner Corner
description:
Dave Dameshek is joined by Ike Taylor and junior welterweight boxer Regis Prograis to discuss Le'Veon Bell's contract negotiations and his future with the Steelers now that he is still without a long term deal. Ike spoke with Bell about his mindset going forward and provides his own insight into when a deal could eventually happen. Also, Shek asks Regis about the upcoming Mayweather vs. McGregor fight and how long he could last in the ring with Mike Tyson. Lastly, the fellas answer questions submitted by Vikings CB Xavier Rhodes and Jaguars CB A.J. Bouye.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
